CustomField.description: For reporting only. Pulls the opposite value of the "No Show / Cancellation" field.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Event__r.Event_Start_Date__c>TODAY(), ISBLANK(Event__r.Event_Start_Date__c), ISPICKVAL(Event__r.Status__c, "Cancelled") ), FALSE, NOT(Event_No_Show__c) )
CustomField.label: Attended
